ul.li: 2/3 cup cocoa powder, sifted (to be found in cabinet in kitchen)
½ granulated sugar (to be found in cabinet above fridge in kitchen)
1/3 cup packed brown sugar (to be found in cabinet above fridge in kitchen)
1 ½ cups whole milk (to be found in fridge in kitchen)
3 ½ cups heavy cream (to be found in fridge in kitchen)

2 teaspoons vanilla extract (to be found in cabinet above fridge in kitchen)
No mixing instructions required. Add all of the listed ingredients into the freezing bowl and let the mixing arm do all the work.
